text: One Hour with You is a 1932 American musical comedy movie directed by Ernst Lubitsch and was based on the play Only a Dream by Lothar Schmidt. It stars Maurice Chevalier, Jeanette MacDonald, Roland Young, Genevieve Tobin, Charles Ruggles, Josephine Dunn, Richard Carle and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1932 and was a remake of the 1924 movie The Marriage Circle. ==Other websites== * * Category:1932 comedy movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Ernst Lubitsch Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: One Hour with You
